leaf

leafleaf encodes the leaves (terminal nodes) of a tree. [19.2 Trees ]

    Note

    The in degree of a leaf is always 1, its out degree always 0.

    Example
    <leaf xml:id="peri1" parent="#n1"> <label>periscope</label> </leaf>
